# cmccloudv2_iam_user (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `first_name` (String) The first name of the IAM user.
- `last_name` (String) The last name of the IAM user.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password for the IAM user.
- `short_name` (String) The username of the IAM user.

### Optional

- `email` (String) The email address of the IAM user.
- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `username` (String)
